ret_issue.respTime: Time of creation (created_at) and time of updation for /issue api should be the same

lsp_issue.transaction_id: Transaction Id should be the id from the logistics transaction in /issue api. It should not be of the retail transactions that is being used for retail

lsp_on_issue.transaction_id: Transaction Id should be the id from the logistics transaction in /issue api. It should not be of the retail transactions that is being used for retail

lsp_issue_close.transaction_id: Transaction Id should be the id from the logistics transaction in /issue api. It should not be of the retail transactions that is being used for retail

lsp_issue_status.transaction_id: Transaction Id should be the id from the logistics transaction in /issue_status api. It should not be of the retail transactions that is being used for retail

lsp_on_issue_status.transaction_id: Transaction Id should be the id from the logistics transaction in /on_issue_status api. It should not be of the retail transactions that is being used for retail
lsp_on_issue_status.org_name: Organization's Name for /on_issue api in message/issue/issue_actions/respondent_actions/[2] mismatched with BPP ID
